0.title: CPU logical cores
0.query:
timeseries avg(dt.containers.cpu.logical_cores), by: { dt.entity.container_group_instance }
| fieldsAdd containers.cpu.logical_cores = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.containers.cpu.logical_cores)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.container_group_instance, "entity.name")
| sort containers.cpu.logical_cores desc
| limit 20

1.title: CPU shares
1.query:
timeseries avg(dt.containers.cpu.shares), by: { dt.entity.container_group_instance }
| fieldsAdd containers.cpu.shares = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.containers.cpu.shares)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.container_group_instance, "entity.name")
| sort containers.cpu.shares desc
| limit 20

2.query:
